txml

Class TXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • txml.TXml

  • public class TXml
extends Object
    This is the main class for TXml library. It provides API for document store, XPath query, document modifications and read of documents.
    Author:
    Tomas Kunovsky

      • getSnapshot

        public XMLEventReader getSnapshot(Connection connection,
                         String schema,
                         String documentName,
                         String time)
                           throws SQLException
        Returns XML document valided in time time.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection of target database
        schema - schema name
        documentName - document name in database
        time - time instance formatted as "d. M. yyyy H:mm:ss"
        Returns:
        document snapshot
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        XMLEventReader

      • getSnapshot

        public XMLEventReader getSnapshot(Connection connection,
                         String schema,
                         String documentName,
                         String time,
                         String timeFormat)
                           throws SQLException
        Returns XML document valided in time time.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection of target database
        schema - schema name
        documentName - document name in database
        time - time instance formatted as timeFormat
        timeFormat - time format for time
        Returns:
        document snapshot
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        XMLEventReader
